Package com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl

Class Summary
LwjglApplet An OpenGL surface in an applet.
LwjglApplication An OpenGL surface fullscreen or in a lightweight window.
LwjglApplicationConfiguration  
LwjglAWTCanvas An OpenGL surface on an AWT Canvas, allowing OpenGL to be embedded in a Swing application.
LwjglAWTFrame Wraps an LwjglAWTCanvas in a resizable JFrame.
LwjglAWTInput  
LwjglCanvas An OpenGL surface on an AWT Canvas, allowing OpenGL to be embedded in a Swing application.
LwjglClipboard Clipboard implementation for desktop that uses the system clipboard via the default AWT Toolkit.
LwjglFileHandle  
LwjglFiles  
LwjglFrame Wraps an LwjglCanvas in a resizable JFrame.
LwjglGLU  
LwjglGraphics An implementation of the Graphics interface based on Lwjgl.
LwjglNativesLoader  
LwjglNet LWJGL implementation of the Net API, it could be reused in other Desktop backends since it doesn't depend on LWJGL.
LwjglPreferences  
LwjglServerSocket Server socket implementation using java.net.ServerSocket.
LwjglSocket Socket implementation using java.net.Socket.
